I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
i take vitamin c when i have a cold.
i have five different flavors of coffee in my fridge.

I just finished building my new gaming computer.
i do not like my reputation.
my family hates my fiancé.
i m a profesional translator.

content.text: Hey there! How was your day?
Hi there! My day was very good. I just finished building my new gaming computer.
Oh wow! That's awesome! I have always wanted to build my own gaming computer but I'm not sure if I have the skills for it.
It's not as hard as it seems! There are a lot of great resources online that can help you learn how to build a computer.
That's good to know! Maybe I'll look into it. What games do you like to play on your computer?
I mainly play first-person shooters and strategy games. I'm really excited to play the new Call of Duty game that comes out next month.
Oh yeah, that game looks really good! I'm also excited for the new Battlefield game that comes out later this year.
I've never played a Battlefield game before, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're a lot of fun.
I will! I'm always looking for new games to play.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites. But one of my all-time favorites is The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
Oh wow, that's a great choice! I love those movies too. They're so well-made.
Yeah, they're definitely some of the best movies ever made.
I agree! So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with some friends or just relax at home.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go out with some friends tonight. We're going to see a movie.
Oh, that sounds fun! What movie are you seeing?
I'm not sure yet. We're still trying to decide.
Well, have fun!
Thanks! You too
